channel.title: deb打包 on WorkSpace
channel.description: Recent content in deb打包 on WorkSpace

item.title: Build 5GC-C
item.description: 1. 安装打包工具 apt-get install -y ruby rubygems ruby-dev #gem sources --add https://gems.ruby-china.org/ --remove https://rubygems.org/ #gem sources -l gem install fpm 2. 构建目录结构 tree文件 root@gmzhang-dev:/home/gmzhang/work/dongfeng/deb-build/5gc-c-build# tree . ├── build.sh ├── README.md └── source ├── 5gc-c.service ├── amf │ └── amf1 │ ├── bin │ │ └── amf │ ├── config │ │ ├── amf.conf │ │ └── asn.log.properties │ ├── context │ │ └── SystemVersionDB │ ├── data │ │ └── statistics │ ├── licensefile -> .
